rules_text: When Tin Woodsman dies, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“In each Transplant, I see perfection—what once labored under its own complexity now simplified to a single directive and a quiet whirr.”
—Vernus Prioleau, Master Tinker[/i]
